title: Fritz cola font
content:
Hi!

Can anyone name this Fritz kola font? or maybe you have a suggestion for a similar one out there?

Thanks  
Nicolai

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [454340764\_f834ed4600\_o.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20120627030420/http:/typophile.com/files/454340764_f834ed4600_o.jpg) | 294.08 KB |
author: Hexenlaub

comments.content:
I would suggest that may have been customized from Futura as a starting point. The i is an l with a line across it. The t and f might be those letters with extenders. All the vertical letters have been lengthened from the original font.

- Mike Yanega

I'd guess it's a custom font. FWIW, I found [this PDF](http://web.archive.org/web/20120627030420/http:/fritz-kola.de/fileadmin/redakteure/pdf/RZ_fk_Spruehschablonen.pdf) that has more of it (but converted to outlines).
